Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Cermak-Chinatown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
Allow extra travel time.
